content: here s a great way to use up all of those odds and ends and left-over bits of yarn that you don t want to part with once you have completed a project use any fiber or yarn brand to complete this project mix and match your fibers to create a great little hostess gift for a friend a set of four can be made with as little as 52 yards of yarn and can be completed in about 45 minutes from start to finish i use a hook that is generally a bit smaller than the recommended yarn size to make a nice tight weave you could easily increase the size of your finished project simply by adding an additional round or two before finishing with reverse single_crochet there are many lovely coaster patterns available here on ravelry this is just my version of a simple coaster pattern idea enjoy
